patthana15.8:4.1: Hetuṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.8:5.1: Hetuṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.8:6.1: Nahetuṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
